snippet: A hot air balloon caught fire and crashed after running into power lines in the New Zealand countryside.
abstract: Hot air balloon carrying 11 people in New Zealand bursts into flames after crashing into power lines, killing everyone aboard.
lead_paragraph: A hot air balloon caught fire and crashed after running into power lines in the New Zealand countryside.

headline.seo: 11 Die in Fiery New Zealand Balloon Crash
headline.main: 11 Die in New Zealand Balloon Crash
headline.print_headline: 11 Die in New Zealand Balloon Crash
